skills.name: slimeAttack
skills.description: How do you even have this skill? Only slimes have this

skills.name: strongAttack
skills.description: Swing your keyboard for high damage. Causes 20 stress.

skills.name: wideAttack
skills.description: Hit all enemies for medium damage. Causes 45 stress

skills.name: strongWideAttack
skills.description: Hit all enemies for high damage. Causes 70 stress

skills.name: weakWideAttack
skills.description: Hit all enemies for low damage. Causes 30 stress

skills.name: medAttack
skills.description: A slightly stronger attack. Causes 10 stress

skills.name: healTeam
skills.description: Heals the whole party. Health recovered is based off attack. Causes 35 stress

skills.name: healTarget
skills.description: Heals a target party member. Health recovered is based off attack. Causes 25 stress

skills.name: weakHealStress
skills.description: Reduce stress for a target party member by 20. Causes 10 stress

skills.name: healStress
skills.description: Reduce stress for a target party member by 40. Causes 25 stress

skills.name: teamHealStress
skills.description: Reduce stress for everyone in the team by 20. Causes 45 stress

skills.name: buffAtk
skills.description: Increases Attack by 50% for their next turn. Causes 30 stress

skills.name: selfBuffAtk
skills.description: Increases Attack by 50% for the next 2 turns. Causes 25 stress

skills.name: teamBuffAtk
skills.description: Increases Attack by 50% for the next turn. Causes 25 stress
